greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = index of the column where n is located in array A278511, a(1) = 0.
comment: a(1) = 0 as the 1 is outside of array A278511 proper.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10707
formula: a(1) = 0; for n > 1, if A278169(n) = 1 [when n is > 1 and in A000960], a(n) = 1, a(2n) = n, and for the rest of odd numbers, a(n) = 1 + A278529(n).
program: (Scheme) (define (A278537 n) (cond ((= 1 n) 0) ((not (zero? (A278169 n))) 1) ((even? n) (/ n 2)) (else (+ 1 (A278529 n)))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
